subject: Appointment Reminder: Dr. Sarah Johnson - Tomorrow at 2:00 PM

body.text:
Appointment Reminder

Dear Patient,

This is a reminder that you have an upcoming appointment:

Patient: John Doe
Provider: Dr. Sarah Johnson, MD (Cardiology)
Date: Wednesday, January 15, 2025
Time: 2:00 PM
Location: Memorial Medical Center, Building A, Suite 300
Address: 123 Healthcare Blvd, San Francisco, CA 94110

Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete check-in.

What to bring:
- Photo ID
- Insurance card
- List of current medications
- Recent test results (if applicable)

If you need to reschedule or cancel:
Call: (415) 555-0100
Online: memorialmedical.org/appointments

COVID-19 Safety:
- Masks are required in all clinical areas
- Please reschedule if you have symptoms

Thank you for choosing Memorial Medical Center.

Memorial Medical Center
123 Healthcare Blvd
San Francisco, CA 94110
(415) 555-0100
